00071 class SIM_API cSimulation : public cNamedObject, noncopyable
00072 {
00073     friend class cSimpleModule;
00074   private:
00075     // global variables
00076     static cSimulation *simPtr; // the active cSimulation instance
00077     static cEnvir *evPtr;       // the active cEnvir instance
00078     static cEnvir *staticEvPtr; // the environment to activate when simPtr becomes NULL
00079 
00080     // variables of the module vector
00081     int size;                 // size of vector
00082     int delta;                // if needed, grows by delta
00083     cModule **vect;           // vector of modules, vect[0] is not used
00084     int last_id;              // index of last used pos. in vect[]
00085 
00086     // simulation vars
00087     cEnvir *ownEvPtr;         // the environment that belongs to this simulation object
00088     cModule *systemmodp;      // pointer to system (root) module
00089     cSimpleModule *activitymodp; // the module currently executing activity() (NULL if handleMessage() or in main)
00090     cComponent *contextmodp;  // component in context (or NULL)
00091     int contexttype;          // the innermost context type (one of CTX_BUILD, CTX_EVENT, CTX_INITIALIZE, CTX_FINISH)
00092     cModuleType *networktype; // network type
00093     cScheduler *schedulerp;   // event scheduler
00094     simtime_t warmup_period;  // warm-up period
00095 
00096     int simulationstage;      // simulation stage (one of CTX_NONE, CTX_BUILD, CTX_EVENT, CTX_INITIALIZE, CTX_FINISH or CTX_CLEANUP)
00097     simtime_t sim_time;       // simulation time (time of current event)
00098     eventnumber_t event_num;  // sequence number of current event
00099 
00100     cMessage *msg_for_activity; // helper variable to pass the received message into activity()
00101     cException *exception;    // helper variable to get exceptions back from activity()
00102     bool trap_on_next_event;  // when set, next handleMessage or activity() will execute debugger interrupt
00103 
00104     cHasher *hasherp;         // used for fingerprint calculation
00105 
00106   private:
00107     // internal
00108     void checkActive()  {if (getActiveSimulation()!=this) throw cRuntimeError(this, eWRONGSIM);}
00109 
00110   public:
00111     // internal: FES
00112     cMessageHeap msgQueue;    // future messages (FES)
00113     cMessageHeap& getMessageQueue() {return msgQueue;}  // accessor for sim_std.msg
00114 
00115   public:
00122     cSimulation(const char *name, cEnvir *env);
00123 
00127     virtual ~cSimulation();
00129 
00136     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00137 
00141     virtual std::string getFullPath() const;
00143 
00149     static cSimulation *getActiveSimulation()  {return simPtr;}
00150 
00155     static cEnvir *getActiveEnvir()  {return evPtr;}
00156 
00162     static void setActiveSimulation(cSimulation *sim);
00163 
00168     static void setStaticEnvir(cEnvir *env);
00169 
00173     static cEnvir *getStaticEnvir()  {return staticEvPtr;}
00174 
00178     cEnvir *getEnvir() const  {return ownEvPtr;}

00208     cModule *getModuleByPath(const char *modulepath) const;
00209 
00213     cModule *getModule(int id) const  {return id>=0 && id<size ? vect[id] : NULL;}
00214 
00220     _OPPDEPRECATED cModule& operator[](int id) const  {return id>=0 && id<size ? *vect[id] : *(cModule *)NULL;}
